thread.title: claudia bazzigalupi
thread.title_full: Redding Medical Inc. reviewed by claudia bazzigalupi

author: claudia bazzigalupi
title: claudia bazzigalupi
text: I did not receive the stethoscope I paid for. I send a Lot of mails asking the company to send me the right colour ( which was the caribbean blue pediatric) and they answered me with questions and questions whithout sending me the product I had asked and paid for. They send me blue, and NOT caribbean blue. And I asked them to change it, but they didn't.
